auto_remediation.description: Mode options: 'blocking' (block commit on drift), 'tasks' (generate task list), 'semi-auto' (prompt user to ask Kiro for fixes)

semi_auto_fix.description: Semi-automatic mode - User must manually ask Kiro to fix drift. Kiro then fixes everything and commits automatically.

validation.description: Toggle which validations to run. Set to false to disable specific checks.
